name: Add-on Service in a box
description: Bootstrap a new cloud service in seconds, with all of the ops and marketing best practices baked in.

ADDON_NAME.description: The full name of your add-on service, e.g., 'Cloud Widget'.

ADDON_ID.description: The shorthand version of your add-on name that developers will use on the CLI: https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/add-on-manifest#fields

ADDON_CONFIG_VARS.description: A comma separated list of the configuration variables that will be set by your add-on: https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/add-on-manifest#fields

ADDON_REGIONS.description: A comma separated list of geographical regions supported by your add-on (e.g., 'us,eu').

ADDON_DOMAIN.description: The domain your add-on will be served from, e.g., cloudwidgets.io

COMPANY_NAME.description: Your registered company or trading name, e.g., Cloud Widgets LLC

DATABASE_ENCRYPT_KEY.description: Used to encrypt secrets within the database.

ADDON_API_PASSWORD.description: Password used to by Heroku to access the API.

ADDON_SSO_SALT.description: Shared secret with Heroku for transferring logged in users from Dashboard.

SIDEKIQ_ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Admin password used to log in to view background worker queue.

SESSION_SECRET.description: Secret used to encrypt user sessions/cookies.
